macros.macro: <#macro select_4_pincode> dpc.id AS 'id', dpc.company_id AS 'companyId', dpc.pin_code AS 'pinCode', dpc.pin_enabled AS 'enabled', dpc.batch_no AS 'batchNo', dpc.device_id AS 'deviceId', dpc.store_id AS 'storeId', dpc.pincode_status AS 'pinCodeStatus', DATE_ADD(dpc.bind_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS 'bindingDate' </#macro>

sql.body: SELECT dpc.pin_code AS 'pinCode' FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_code IN (<#list pinCodes as em>'${em}'<#sep>, </#list>)
SELECT <@select_4_pincode />, <@crud_fixed_select alias="dpc" /> FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.batch_no = :batchNo AND dpc.pin_enabled = 1 AND dpc.company_id = :companyId
SELECT <@select_4_pincode />, <@crud_fixed_select alias="dpc" /> FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_code = :pinCode AND dpc.pin_enabled = 1
SELECT <@select_4_pincode />, <@crud_fixed_select alias="dpc" /> FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_enabled = 1 AND (dpc.device_id = :deviceId OR dpc.pin_code = :pinCode )
SELECT <@select_4_pincode />, <@crud_fixed_select alias="dpc" /> FROM DEVICE_PIN_CODE AS dpc WHERE dpc.pin_enabled = 1 AND dpc.device_id = :deviceId
UPDATE DEVICE_PIN_CODE SET device_id = :deviceId, bind_date = :bindingDate, pincode_status = :pinCodeStatus WHERE pin_code = :pinCode AND pin_enabled = 1
UPDATE DEVICE_PIN_CODE SET pin_enabled = 0 WHERE device_id = :deviceId AND pin_enabled = 1

INSERT INTO DEVICE_PIN_CODE (company_id, pin_code, pin_enabled, device_id, bind_date, store_id, pincode_status,tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (:companyId, :pinCode, :enabled , :deviceId , :bindingDate, :storeId, :pinCodeStatus ,100000000, -1, NOW() )
INSERT INTO DEVICE_PIN_CODE (company_id, pin_code, pincode_status, batch_no,tenant_id, creator, createTime) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW())

SELECT tnc.id AS 'id', tnc.company_id AS 'companyId', tnc.web_domain AS 'webDomain', tnc.web_port AS 'port', <@crud_fixed_select alias="tnc" /> FROM TENANT_NET_CONFIG AS tnc WHERE tnc.company_id= :companyId

SELECT sai.id AS 'id', sai.company_id AS 'companyId', sai.store_id AS 'storeId', sai.device_id AS 'deviceId', sai.deadline AS 'deadline', sai.active_date AS 'activeDate', <@crud_fixed_select alias="sai" /> FROM STORE_ACTIVED_INFO AS sai WHERE sai.device_id= :deviceId AND sai.delete_flag = 0

SELECT sai.id AS 'id', sai.company_id AS 'companyId', sai.store_id AS 'storeId', sai.device_id AS 'deviceId', sai.deadline AS 'deadline', sai.active_date AS 'activeDate', <@crud_fixed_select alias="sai" /> FROM STORE_ACTIVED_INFO AS sai WHERE sai.store_id= :storeId AND sai.company_id = :companyId AND sai.delete_flag = 0
UPDATE STORE_ACTIVED_INFO SET device_id = :deviceId ,editTime = NOW() WHERE id = :id
